name: Simple List View
description: Displays content from a collection in a standard, sorted list. Ideal for blogs.

schema.title: List View Configuration
schema.description: Configure how this list of content should be displayed.

source_collection.title: Content Source
source_collection.description: Choose the collection to display items from.

item_layout.title: Item Display Layout
item_layout.description: Choose how each item in the list should look (e.g., a teaser card).

limit.title: Maximum Number of Items
limit.description: Leave blank to show all items.
